name: Vanguard2
0:
”Alexa, ask vanguard controller turn on sensor one”
”Alexa, ask vanguard controller make sensor one light yellow”
”Alexa, ask vanguard controller get temperature from sensor two”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vanguard controller
des:
prerequisites: vanguard device, sensors (thunderboards), cloud software release by usi, and an account for account linking.

skill core functionality: 
1. get data from specific sensor.(temperature/humidity/battery level/UV/air pressure/ambient light/sound level/...)(sensor one,sensor two,sensor three...)
2. make the sensor light in (blue/red/green/teal/yellow/...) color.
